name: A Crown for Crows
description:
A worker placement game about managing crows to steal a crown, in the long run.

How to play:
1. Select an action to place a "worker" into.
2. Complete a challenge once enough resources have been created.
3. Complete the minimum amount of challenges (as stated underneath "Crown Challenges") to unlock the next layer of challenges.

Note:
- The game is much better played in full screen mode.
- If the game doesn't work on itch.io, you can play it here instead: https://seagamejam2021.zhifez.com/

Development
The game is not actively maintained anymore. However, if you like the game but thought it's very unbalanced and would like to make it better, feel free to fork the source and tweak it to your own desire: https://github.com/zhifez/seagamejam2021
